verses.roman:
tāte śayana karena prabhu,--dekhi' sabe sukhī
jagadānanda--bhitare krodha bāhire mahā-duḥkhī

synonyms: tāte—on that; śayana karena—lies down; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhi'-seeing; sabe sukhī—everyone became happy; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; bhitare—within his mind; krodha—angry; bāhire—externally; mahā-duḥkhī—very unhappy.
translation: Everyone was happy to see the Lord lie down on that bed, but Jagadānanda was inwardly angry, and externally he appeared very unhappy.
